title: Inconsistent failure to load any visuals
body:
I've recently been having an issue where every once in a while league seems to just not load visuals at all. I can tell the game's still running because friends tell me I continue to load, and once the game starts I can hear the audio like usual, but I'm completely stuck on a black screen. It won't even let me tab out to close the client and restart, the only thing I seem to be able to do to get out of it when I realize this is happening is to just completely restart my computer, which typically results in a remake.

All of this happens fairly rarely - like in one out of every ten to twenty games. I have no idea what's causing it though and no way to really check anything when it happens since as I said it pretty much completely locks up my display, won't let me tab out or anything. The rest of the time I can play just fine.

Can anyone help me with this? A quick search only seems to turn up cases of people just not loading altogether, but the game's obviously still going for me, just with a black screen for some reason.

replies.body: It sounds like you were able to establish a connection to the game server, but there's some kind of hardware or driver failure failing to render the game itself.   My suggestion for your specific issue is to run through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure everything is updated and running smoothly. Test it in a custom game just in case, and let me know if you have any questions.
